name: Chapter 1 (softsound, chrisRONIN, Thorny)
description:
Explore a world of riddles, monsters and mayhem in this comedy horror adventure featuring cute animals and deadly enemies. Can you make sure everyone survives? There are 9 rooms total can you get to end without a loss?

Subtitle option is in the menu.

Controls:
WASD or Arrow keys to move

Mouse to click on stuff.

Click to speed through text.

You can turn on/off subtitles by clicking menu > subtitle on

*fixed collision bugs

*various fixes for chamber with dog
